::Amperion::
      The CR chamber finishes repairing him and he gets out of it willing to fight.  He scans around for others and locates some outside.  He exits the ship.  The fact that they look ready for a battle intrigues him.  He transforms and drws his blades.  "I don't know you but I will fight to avenge my defeat.  Don't get me wrong I'm just looking for a fight.  Besides I owe Angel Prime a favor."
